description:
Changed the bass tuning from BEBEGC to BF#BEGC.
Everything flows much nicer and there were some unnecessary tricky parts that are now way easier.
title: Deadman

description:
Found out the guitar tuning is actually DADFAE, not DADFAD.
Does make a couple parts slightly easier.
Updated the tab :)
title: Deadman

description:
Spent the last couple months doing an absolutely huge overhaul on this song. 
I used the raw multi-tracks and live shows as reference, the time signatures and tempos are 100% correct.
I arranged the guitars into two main tracks and an extras one. 
The bass, I'm pretty sure is absolutely perfect. I worked out the tuning from where Jon was playing on the fretboard live. And yes, it is safe to tune those strings a whole note higher.

I don't know anything about drums I'm afraid so I wasn't able to make a drum track, but if somebody would like to do the drums please feel free, it is super easy to sync the song to the tab in Guitar Pro.

Anyway, I hope you guys enjoy!
title: Deadman
